document.docTitle: Mononchus minutus Naumova & Gagarin 2018, sp. n.
document.masterDocTitle: Prodorylaimus baikalensis sp. n. and Mononchus minutus sp. n. (Nematoda) from Lake Baikal, Russia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Prodorylaimus baikalensis sp. n. and Mononchus minutus sp. n. (Nematoda) from Lake Baikal, Russia

subSubSection.paragraph: Etymology . The specific epithet means “small, minute”.

subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Male. BOdy cOmparatively shOrt and thin. Cuticle smOOth, 3–4 µm thick at mid-bOdy. Lips well develOped, angular. Labial regiOn Offset frOm the adJacent bOdy. Labial and cephalic papillae cOnical. CheilOstOm small. Buccal cavity large and cOmparatively narrOw. Its length 2.3–2.5 times is mOre than its width. StOma walls strOngly cuticulariZed. StOma 1.8–2.2 times as lOng as labial regiOn diameter. Large dOrsal tOOth lOcated in anteriOr pOrtiOn Of buccal cavity, in apeX situated at 86–91% frOm base Of buccal cavity. A shOrt transverse rib situated OppOsite the dOrsal tOOth. Amphidial fOvea lOcated at the level Of anteriOr pOrtiOn Of buccal cavity. PharynX slender, muscular, cOmparatively lOng, slightly swOllen prOXimally. PharynX-intestinal JunctiOn nOn-tuberculate. Caudal glands cOmparatively large, rOund. ReprOductive system diOrchic, testes OppOsed. AnteriOr testis straight, On the right Of the right Of the intestine, pOsteriOr testis refleXed, On the right Of the intestine. Spicules lOng, thin, ventrally curved and 2.8–3.8 times as lOng as clOacal bOdy width as measured alOng the curved median line. Gubernaculum stick-shaped. AnteriOr tO clOaca are 21–25 regularly spaced ventrOmedian supplements in the fOrm Of shOrt tubes. Tail slender, elOngate-cOnical, slightly curved ventrally. Tail terminus swOllen. Caudal gland and spinneret well

Scale bars: A—500 µm; B—200 µm; C—100 µm; F, G, I, J—50 µm; D, E, H—20 µm.

subSubSection.paragraph: Female . General mOrphOlOgy is similar tO that Of males in structure Of cuticle and anteriOr bOdy end. Cuticle smOOth. Buccal cavity large, its length 2.1–2.4 times its width. Large dOrsal tOOth in anteriOr pOrtiOn, with shOrt transverse rib situated OppOsite. Amphidial fOvea lOcated at the base Of labial regiOn, at the level Of anteriOr pOrtiOn Of buccal cavity. PharynX slender, muscular, cOmparatively lOng, slightly swOllen prOXimally. Caudal glands large, rOund. Rectum 0.7–1.1 times as lOng as anal bOdy diameter. ReprOductive system didelphic, amphidelphic. Ovaries refleXed, tips generally nOt reaching the uterus-Oviduct JunctiOn. AnteriOr Ovary On right side and pOsteriOr Ovary Of left side Of intestine. Terminal ZOne Of OOgOnia arranged in One Or twO rOws, grOwth ZOne with a single rOw Of gradually enlarging OOcytes. Vagina with slightly muscular walls, Occupying 30–45% Of cOrrespOnding bOdy width. Uterus spaciOus, filled with small rOunded spermatOZOa and cOntaining 1– 2 eggs measuring 150–182 X 63 – 78 µm. Vulva a transverse slit, situated slightly pOsteriOr tO mid-bOdy. Vulval lips unsclerOtiZed and slightly prOtruding Outside the bOdy cOntOur. Tail elOngate-cOnical, slightly curved ventrally. Tail terminus swOllen. Caudal glands and spinneret present.

Diagnosis . BOdy 2337–2825 µm lOng in males, 2380–2893 µm lOng in females. Cuticle smOOth. Labial and cephalic setae in the shape Of papillae. Buccal cavity large and cOmparatively narrOw, 64–74 µm lOng and 28–31 µm wide. DOrsal tOOth large, its apeX situated at 86–91% frOm base Of buccal cavity. OppOsite dOrsal tOOth situated shOrt transverse rib. StOma 1.8–2.2 times as lOng as labial regiOn diameter. PharynX muscular, cOmparatively lOng. PharynX- intestinal JunctiOn nOn-tuberculate. Cardial glands large, rOund. Vulva a transverse slit, situated slightly pOsteriOr tO mid-bOdy. Uterus spaciOus, cOntaining One Or twO eggs measuring 150–182 X 63 –78 µm. Spicules 205– 215 µm lOng, thin, curved ventrally. Gubernaculum stick-shaped. PreclOacal supplements 21–25 in number, regularly spaced. Tail slender, elOngate-cOnical, slightly curved ventrally.
